content: in a case involving the division of property between two former spouses the court in pavia issued a final resolution the plaintiffs principal claim was upheld and the court ordered the division of the property a courtappointed expert created a divisional project assigning specific portions of the property to each party the plaintiff was awarded lot b which included a twostorey villa garages and a warehouse the defendant was assigned a flat in a condominium named do 2 as part of the division the plaintiff was ordered to pay €29500 to the defendant the court also addressed the repayment of sums paid towards a mortgage loan ruling in favor of the plaintiff and rejecting their claim for repayment the defendants counterclaim for restitution of sums from certain bank accounts was also rejected due to insufficient evidence both parties were ordered to pay the legal costs of the proceedings and share the expenses for the courtappointed experts report additionally the court ordered the judgment to be transcribed in the public land registers
